roleset.name: arrive at an end state, outcome or destination, get to, attain

role.descr: goal, destination, end state, thing attained

example.name: reach-v
example.text: Deere& Co reached a tentative agreement with the machinists' union at its Horicon Wis plant.
example.arg: a tentative agreement with the machinists' union at its Horicon Wis plant.

example.name: reach-v
example.text: Any potential acquirer will have to reach some kind of accord with the company's employees.
example.arg: some kind of accord with the company's employees.

roleset.note: REACH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reach' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'gain' and 'get'. VerbNet class reach-51.8, get-13.5.1. Treebank often gives a bogus parse for (eg) "reach an agreementwith John". Clearly it should be [reach] [an agreement with John],but Treebank has chosen [reach] [an agreement] [with John], probablybecause you can extract the agreement (ie, in passive sentences) butleave the PP "with John" behind. You'll have to follow the twoexamples above based on which syntactic parse is given. (from reach.01-v)
REACHING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from reaching.01-j)

roleset.name: get in contact with (often over the phone)

example.name: reach-v: passive
example.text: [Canadian Pacific]-1 couldn't be reached *trace*-1 for comment.

roleset.note: REACH-V NOTES: Almost all examples of this roleset are passive. (from reach.02-v)

roleset.name: stretch, grasp, move (as if a limb) outwards toward a goal

example.name: with particle of direction
example.text: I had to reach back to French 101.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: He reached out his arm and showed his power .

roleset.note: REACH-V NOTES: This roleset is for reaching that describes a dynamic event. An agent moves a body part (or such) outward toward something that it wants to touch or grasp.

roleset.name: span (static)

role.descr: one end of the span (from where)
the other end of the span (to where)

example.name: reach-v
example.text: Stretching 750 kilometers from end to end , they reach from near the coast of Myanmar almost to Sumatra in Indonesia .
example.arg: Stretching 750 kilometers from end to end
from near the coast of Myanmar

example.name: reach-n
example.text: His political reach extended from Armenia to Zanzibar.

roleset.note: REACH-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Google. This roleset is limited to static spans-- no actual movement is happening, a spatial span is being described.
This example describes a span, not an act of movement.
